scripts.build: redocly join openapi/openapi-base.yaml openapi/resources/appendix.yaml openapi/resources/auth-v1.yaml openapi/resources/cards-v1.yaml openapi/resources/charges-v1.yaml openapi/resources/customers-v1.yaml openapi/resources/sessions-v1.yaml -o dist/openapi.yaml --prefix-components-with-info-prop title
scripts.test: redocly lint openapi/openapi-base.yaml openapi/resources/appendix.yaml openapi/resources/auth-v1.yaml openapi/resources/cards-v1.yaml openapi/resources/charges-v1.yaml openapi/resources/customers-v1.yaml openapi/resources/sessions-v1.yaml
